programmes.show_description: Action thriller with Dolph Lundgren. DEA agent tries to bring down a drug syndicate and rescue an undercover operative who has infiltrated the gang. (2013)
Western based on true events. Former outlaw Nathaniel Reed's peaceful existence on the Texas frontier is shattered when a vengeful US Marshal starts hunting him down. (2016)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Legend returns soon.
Put the pleasure back into shopping from the comfort of your home and choose from a selection of innovative products.
Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Walker investigates misconduct at a racetrack by an owner looking to increase his horse's value. S5, Ep10
Face poses as a Yale graduate to con his way into a country club, only to stumble upon a pair of counterfeiters operating in a shack just off the seventh green. S4, Ep15
When an out-of-season hurricane devastates the Florida coast, a small community is miraculously spared and Vincent goes to investigate the unusual event.
Catastrophic creature feature. A scientific experiment goes horribly wrong, leading to a clash between a giant ape and an enormous Gila monster - with the future of mankind in question. (2021)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Western with Randolph Scott. A cowboy recruits three outlaws to rescue a woman from a Comanche camp and reunite her with her husband in return for a large reward. (1960)
Western with Gene Hackman. An unlikely assortment of individuals enter a 700-mile horse race through the Southwest desert hoping to win a large cash prize. (1975)
Kirk and Spock take leave of their senses while investigating the source of a disembodied voice that has lured them to a devastated planet. S2, Ep20/26
After a spate of mysterious deaths where the victims are found frozen for no apparent reason, Vincent investigates believing that Invaders are behind them.
Face has a problem on his hands when he unintentionally books Boy George, instead of country singer Cowboy George, to entertain a town full of rednecks. S4, Ep16
Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. A female construction worker finds herself in great danger when she files suit against the company owner. S5, Ep11
Action adventure directed by Keanu Reeves, starring Tiger Hu Chen. A rebellious martial arts expert risks corrupting his spirit as he joins an illegal fighting circuit to protect his temple. (2013)
Adventure with Taron Egerton. A battle-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander launch an audacious rebellion against the corrupt English crown. (2018)
Epic fantasy adventure with Brigitte Nielsen. Armed with a magic sword, a fearless warrior sets out to avenge her family's deaths and stop a murderous queen from using a powerful talisman. (1985)
Hammer horror. When a plague spreads through a Cornish village, it is discovered that the victims' graves are empty and a deranged Squire dabbling in black magic has an army of zombies. (1966)

Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home... Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Sci-fi thriller. A team of disabled service personnel are sent to fight a pack of reptilian creatures wreaking havoc across the globe. (2017)
Take a look at all the latest movies and series coming your way this month!
Vincent has an opportunity to testify in front of an investigating commission and expose the Invaders, but is waylaid by a man who has discovered an Invader weapon.
When a charter pilot is forced into an emergency landing a passenger is injured, but when the man doesn't react as expected an Invader secret is revealed.
Suspecting alien activity in Houston, Vincent takes a job at an oil field where he falls in love with the owner's daughter - but a UFO sighting complicates matters.
When an out-of-season hurricane devastates the Florida coast, a small community is miraculously spared and Vincent goes to investigate the unusual event.
After a spate of mysterious deaths where the victims are found frozen for no apparent reason, Vincent investigates believing that Invaders are behind them.
Western with Dale Robertson. A judge finds himself the victim of a campaign of intimidation when he's called to preside over the trial of the son of a ruthless town ruler. (1964)
Western horror with John Carradine. Billy the Kid settles down with a beautiful ranch owner, but when her eerie uncle comes to visit, Billy begins to suspect he might be the vampire Dracula. (1966)
Thriller based on Frederick Forsyth's novel, with Jon Voight. A journalist tries to discover the new identity of a concentration camp commandant to expose his crimes to the world. (1974)

A man's intense yearning for his youth turns him into a boy again. S4, Ep15
Action thriller with Owen Wilson. An American family moves to Asia, but faces a fight for survival when a revolution sweeps the country and the new government seeks to eliminate foreigners (2015)
Thriller with Clive Owen. An Interpol agent and a district attorney risk their lives to bring to light the vast range of illegal activities being carried out by a major international bank. (2009)
